citations.narrative:
Records had not been updated to include recent births and dispositions at the facility. The most recent inventory was
dated in Jan 2023, and there had been multiple births at the facility that had taken place since then. Records need to be
maintained to accurately reflect the animals held at the facility as well as any offspring born. The facility must correct this
issue.
*******Correct by June 15, 2023

One pen holding 5 sheep had a water receptacle that was severely rusted. There were areas where the metal edges were
broken and jagged, with collections of debris. This could lead to injury of the animals and due to the inability to be
completely sanitized can cause the water to become contaminated. Water receptacles need to be kept clean and sanitary
and replaced when necessary. The licensee must correct this issue.
********Correct by June 15, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Records had not been updated to include recent births and dispositions at the facility. The most recent inventory was 
dated in Jan 2023, and there had been multiple births at the facility that had taken place since then. Records need to be 
maintained to accurately reflect the animals held at the facility as well as any offspring born. The facility must correct this 
issue.  
*******Correct by June 15, 2023 
3.130 
   
Watering. 
One pen holding 5 sheep had a water receptacle that was severely rusted. There were areas where the metal edges were 
broken and jagged, with collections of debris. This could lead to injury of the animals and due to the inability to be 
completely sanitized can cause the water to become contaminated. Water receptacles need to be kept clean and sanitary 
and replaced when necessary. The licensee must correct this issue.  
********Correct by June 15, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
